title: Stepsister Spring Break
description: Within days of Claire's 18th birthday, it's time for spring break. She can't afford to go to Florida, where most of her friends are going, so she goes to her older stepbrother's beach house.Adam hasn't seen his little stepsister in several years. When she arrives at his house he's shocked to see how hot she is.This long weekend won't look anything like a typical family reunion. Especially since Claire has brought a friend along to join in the hot sex.This 12,000+ word novelette contains explicit depictions of sex, including F/F, M/F/F.**This also appears in the "BAD DAUGHTERS" bundle, available now on Amazon.**
author: Erica Sloane
